basics.name: Lauri Saksi
basics.label: Full-Stack Developer
basics.summary: I'm a full stack web developer who can build apps from the ground up. I've worked mostly at startups so I am used to wearing many hats. I am a very product focussed developer who priotizes user feedback first and foremost. I'm generally very flexible when investigating new roles.

education.area: Business Administration and Management, General (Exchange semester)

references.reference: Despite his young age, Lauri Saksi has demonstrated exceptional diligence, flexibility, initiative, and precision in all the tasks assigned to him. Lauri still works for us on a seasonal basis, as needed, and always when we need him most! You can always rely on Lauri! You could even leave your wallet with Lauri without worrying, which hopefully illustrates how much you can trust him!
references.name: Ville Saarikko (K-retailer)

highlights: This resume is built with JSON Resume
work.summary: JSON Resume is a community driven open source initiative to create a JSON based standard for resumes. There is no reason why there can't be a common standard for writing a resume that can be extended with an ecosystem of open source tools.
work.name: JSON Resume

volunteer.summary: Managed relationships and negotiated partnership agreements as account manager for two of Tietokilta's partner companies.
